document.title: Main toolbar
document.paragraph:
At the top of the EiffelBuild development window, one toolbar is displayed by default, as shown below:
/images/eiffelbuild/screenshots/toolbar.png
The complete list of the icons in the toolbar is displayed below.
Icon Command
/images/eiffelbuild/icons/icon_delete_small_color.png
Delete
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object /
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#component component .
/images/eiffelbuild/icons/icon_save_color.png
/tools/eiffelbuild/how_to_s/40_save_a_project/index.html Save current project.
/images/eiffelbuild/icons/icon_object_editor_color.png
New
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/40_object_editor/index.html object editor
/images/eiffelbuild/icons/icon_undo_color.png
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/70_history/index.html#undo Undo last action.
/images/eiffelbuild/icons/icon_cmd_history_color.png
Display full
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/70_history/index.html history .
/images/eiffelbuild/icons/icon_redo_color.png
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/70_history/index.html#redo Redo last undone action.
/images/eiffelbuild/icons/icon_code_generation_color.png
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/90_code_generation/index.html Generate code.
/images/eiffelbuild/icons/icon_system_color.png
Display
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/80_project_settings/index.html project settings .
/images/eiffelbuild/icons/icon_builder_window_color.png
Show/hide
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/60_builder_window/index.html builder window .
/images/eiffelbuild/icons/icon_display_window_color.png
Show/hide
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/50_layout_window/index.html display window .
/images/eiffelbuild/icons/icon_component_viewer_color.png
Show/hide
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/65_component_viewer/index.html component viewer .
/images/eiffelbuild/icons/icon_format_onces_color.png
Display
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/75_constants/index.html Constants dialog.
The screenshot at the top of this page shows all of the buttons enabled. As the state of the currently open project changes, the state of each of these buttons is updated to reflect this. For example, immediately after saving the project, the save button is disabled until the project is modified again.
Note: It is not possible to customize the toolbar.
